name: STAR SAGA ONE - RISE OF THE DOMINATORS
description: STAR SAGA ONE is the initial chapter of non-stop arcade shoot-em-up action in space! Using various weapons and strategy, blast your way to the highest score in the universe!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 855 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7 or higher Processor: intel i7 Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 855 MB available space
